overview: Jerry Rinaldi is the Vice President of Operations and a managing partner at Trumba Corporation. Previously, he has held director-level positions in Development and Test Management at Microsoft and Oracle. Currently he is responsible for quality and availability of the Trumba service (typically between 99.99% and 99.999% availability). Trumba corporation provides event promotion and registration services. Prior to his professional carreer, Jerry was the top-rated graduate (GPA) in the history of the Nuclear Engineering department at the University of Washington.
